meta.title: Bnlang — Banglay, English, ba Banglish-e code likhun
meta.description: Bnlang holo Bangladesh-er jonno toiri byaboharik, obhibyaktipurno programming language o runtime. Bangla, English, ba Banglish-e likhe modern toolchain ar welcoming community diye taratari ship korun.

hero.title: Banglay, English & Banglish-e code likhun
hero.subtitle: Bnlang ekṭi practical ebong expressive programming language o runtime, ja Bangladesh-er demand o context ke mathay rekhe toiri kora hoyeche. Eti apnake matri-bhashay shikhte o software build korte sahajjo korbe, engineering-er rigor bojay rekhe. Clear syntax, predictable semantics, ebong production-ready tooling-er maddhome eta development process-ke kore aro easy, reliable, ebong professional.

why.title: Keno Bnlang?
why.subtitle: Ekti language ja apnar natural expression-ke embrace kore, abar engineering rigor-o thik rakhe: predictable semantics, readable syntax, ar production-ready tooling.

cards.title: Banglay bhabun. Bnlang-e ship korun.
cards.body: Ja vabe apni bhaben, shei vabei code—shobdo, byakaran, flow—tobu-o static structure ar clarity thake.

cards.title: Trilingual Syntax
cards.body: English, Bangla, ba Banglish—ja e komfortable, shetai likhun; clarity ba tooling harabe na. Classroom theke pro-level collab—shob jaygay natural.

cards.title: Modern Toolchain
cards.body: Packages-er jonne BPM, consistent code-er jonne formatter, confidence-er jonne test runner, ar docs tooling—sob language-er sathei build-in.

cards.title: Familiar Async Model
cards.body: Event-driven, non-blocking I/O—Promises ar async/await shoho—server, CLI, ar networked app-er jonne perfect.

cards.title: Production Ready
cards.body: Deterministic builds, clear error messages, ar predictable performance—local theke cloud porjonto dependable.

cards.title: Accessible by Design
cards.body: Bangladesher students, developers, ar teams-der entry barrier komay—tobu reliability ar performance thik thake.

ecosystem.title: Ecosystem
ecosystem.subtitle: Bnlang strong foundation ar open package ecosystem shoho ashe—classroom, startup, ar production shob jaygay ready.

cards.title: Rich Standard Library
cards.body: Files, HTTP, crypto, streams, text—rojkar kajer dorkarigulo ready. Chhoto chhoto kajer jonne alada tool khujar proyojon kom.

cards.title: BPM Packages
cards.body: Official registry diye install, publish, ar share korun. Integrity checks ar signatures diye supply chain secure.

cards.title: CLI & REPL
cards.body: Responsive REPL-e sathe sathe try korun, ar CLI diye project scaffold, test run, formatting, ar package commands—ek jaygay.

cards.title: JavaScript Interop
cards.body: Proyojone existing JavaScript libraries leverage korun, ar sathe Bnlang-er readable syntax ar predictable semantics enjoy korun.

community.title: Community-te jog din
community.subtitle: Prosno korun, contribute korun, ba ja banachhen ta showcase korun. Apnar idea-tei Bnlang boro hoy.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Bnlang-er core capabilities—clear syntax, familiar async model, real package manager, built-in testing, ar practical streaming APIs.

trilingual.title: Trilingual Syntax
trilingual.body: Bangla, Banglish, ba English—ja apnar kache shobcheye natural—tatei likhun; compiler ar tooling etake ekta predictable language hisebe trate kore.
points: Classroom, team, ar public docs-er jonne upojukto
trilingual.caption: Audience-er vasha use korun—readability, structure, ba tooling chara.

async.title: Familiar Async Model
async.body: Event-driven, non-blocking I/O ar async/await app-ke responsive rakhay, tools-o thake snappy.
points: Promises ar async functions—clear code-er jonne
Network ar file workload shohoje compose korun

packages.title: Packages with BPM
packages.body: First-party package manager—lockfiles, integrity verification, ar streamlined scripts shoho.
packages.caption: Install, share, ship—extra glue code chara. BPM language module system-er sathe align.

testing.title: Testing Built-in
testing.body: Lightweight test runner toolchain-er ongsho—day-one thekei team-ke correctness maintain korte shahajyo kore.
testing.caption: Zero-config unit tests, human-readable output, ar CI-te fast feedback.

io.title: Practical I/O-r jonne Streams & Buffers
io.body: Boro file process korte kom memory use korun, ar streaming API diye efficient pipeline toyri korun.
